property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Brand son of Bain attacks and defeats an enemy engaged with another player, choose and ready one of that player's characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Response: After Keen-eyed Took enters play, reveal the top card of each player's deck.
Action: Return Keen-eyed Took to your hand to discard the top card of each player's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Discard a Ì ally to give each hero committed to this quest +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Eagle.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Descendant of Thorondor cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After Descendant of Thorondor enters or leaves play, deal 2 damage to any 1 enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose an Eagle ally. Return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Rohan.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust and discard The Riddermark's Finest to place 2 progress tokens on any location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard a Rohan ally to choose a location. Place 3 progress tokens on that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Gildor Inglorion to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card from your hand. Then, return the 3 cards to the top of your deck, in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play during the Quest phase, before characters are committed to the Quest.
Action: Reveal 1 less card from the encounter deck this phase. (To a minimum of 1.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached hero gains a Ê resource icon.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Amon Hen and Amon Lhaw, and add them to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: If there are no location cards in the staging area, the first treachery card revealed during the quest phase gains surge.
Players cannot defeat this stage unless there are no Emyn Muil locations in play, and they have collected at least 20 victory points.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: X is double the number of players in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Amon Hen is the active location, players cannot play events.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: X is double the number of players in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Amon Lhaw is the active location, treat all attachments as if their printed text boxes were blank.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The East Wall of Rohan is the active location, non-Rohan characters cost 2 additional matching resources to play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After traveling to The North Stair, move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the staging area. Resolve any "when revealed" effects on that card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Rauros Falls is the active location, all characters must commit to the current quest during the quest phase.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: The first player must discard 1 event card from his hand to travel to this location.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Outer Ridge is the active location, each location in the staging area gets +1 $.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: In order to travel to The Highlands, the players must reveal the top card of the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: If there is an active location, remove all progress tokens from that location and return it to the staging area. If no location is moved by this effect, this card gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each character committed to this quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Remove defending character from combat. This attack is considered undefended.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove 1 progress token from each location in play. Then, discard the top card of each player's deck for each progress token removed by this effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mordor. Orc.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Orc Horse Thieves get +1 Û for each location in the staging area.
